title: Prague
description: 4-day trip to Prague exploring Czech history, medieval architecture, and the magical Christmas atmosphere

points.name: U2 7787 (EasyJet)
points.description: EasyJet flight from Porto to Prague

points.name: Strahov Monastery
points.description: Hilltop, medieval monastery with a stucco-panelled theological hall, vast library & Baroque church.

points.name: Petrin Tower
points.description: Landmark cast-iron tower featuring a viewing deck with panoramic city & skyline views.

points.name: Mirror Maze in Petrin Park
points.description: Mirrored wooden labyrinth built for the 1891 Prague Exhibition, with a mural of the city in 1648.

points.name: St. Nicholas Church
points.description: Famous high baroque church built in the 17th & 18th centuries, featuring a 20-meter-diameter dome.

points.name: Lennon Wall
points.description: Colorful wall featuring Communist-era political slogans, peace messages & a portrait of John Lennon.

points.name: Charles Bridge
points.description: Landmark stone bridge linking Prague's Old & New Towns, with street artists & entertainers.

points.name: Charles Bridge Museum
points.description: Quaint museum with a souvenir shop, cafe & exhibits on the history & construction of Charles Bridge.

points.name: River Cruise Prague
points.description: Scenic boat tours on the Vltava River offering unique views of Prague's landmarks.

points.name: Kampa Island
points.description: This small city-center island with a museum on the Vltava River is crossed by the Charles Bridge.

points.name: Pern√≠ƒçk≈Øv sen s. r. o.
points.description: Traditional Czech bakery and souvenir store.

points.name: Prague Christmas Market
points.address: Old Town Square, 110 00 Praha 1, Czech Republic
points.description: Magical Christmas market with traditional Czech crafts, food, and festive atmosphere.

points.name: Prague Castle
points.description: Vast castle complex with buildings revealing architecture from Roman-style to Gothic & 20th century.

points.name: St. Vitus Cathedral
points.description: Gothic resting place of saints including Vitus, Wenceslas & Adalbert as well as the state treasury.

points.name: St. George's Basilica
points.description: Part of Prague Castle, a 10th-century basilica rebuilt in 1142, with baroque facade & Bohemian art.

points.name: Old Royal Palace
points.description: Late Gothic palace in Prague Castle, with Renaissance elements & Vladislav Hall for royal events.

points.name: Pra≈°n√° br√°na
points.description: City gate built in the 15th century and restored after being damaged in the Battle of Prague.

points.name: Smetana Hall
points.description: Historic concert hall and performing arts venue.

points.name: Church of Our Lady before T√Ωn
points.description: 14th-century landmark with 80m towers, ornately carved exteriors & a baroque altarpiece.

points.name: Old Town Square
points.description: Oldest square in the historic center with 10th-century origins, site of many Gothic buildings.

points.name: Jan Hus monument
points.description: Large stone & bronze memorial sculpture depicting a famous martyr, completed in 1915.

points.name: The Golz-Kinsky Palace
points.description: Grand, 18th-century Rococo palace with ornate sculptures & the National Gallery's diverse art.

points.name: Prague Astronomical Clock
points.description: Medieval timepiece on the facade of city hall displaying the twelve apostles as the clock strikes.

points.name: Staromƒõstsk√° radnice
points.description: Gothic 14th-century town hall renowned for its observation tower & intricate astronomical clock.

points.name: Josefov
points.description: Josefov, the former Jewish ghetto, is dotted with somber reminders of its past.

points.name: Spanish Synagogue
points.description: Owned by Prague's Jewish Museum, this Moorish-style place of worship now hosts exhibits & concerts.

points.name: The Old-New Synagogue
points.description: Gothic place of Jewish worship, completed in 1270 & the legendary home of the Golem of Prague.

points.name: Pinkas Synagogue
points.description: Gothic-style synagogue from 1535 featuring a Holocaust memorial to nearly 80,000 Jewish victims.

points.name: Maiselova synagoga
points.description: Small, restored synagogue first built at the end of the 16th century, now with history exhibits.

points.name: The Ceremonial Hall
points.address: U Star√©ho h≈ôbitova 3a, 110 00 Praha 1, Czech Republic
points.description: Displays on Jewish burial rituals, spanning relics & prayers for the dead, in a Romanesque building.

points.name: Old Jewish Cemetery
points.description: Home to 12,000 tombstones but many more burials, including scholar & teacher Judah Loew ben Bezalel.

points.name: Klementinum
points.description: Complex comprised of the Mirror Chapel & Baroque Library, with Atlas atop the Astronomical Tower.

points.name: Old Town Bridge Tower
points.description: Striking 14th-century tower with a wide, arched gateway, Gothic ornamentation & sweeping views.

points.name: Prague Christmas Market
points.address: Old Town Square, 110 00 Praha 1, Czech Republic
points.description: Magical Christmas market with traditional Czech crafts, food, and festive atmosphere.

points.name: Hofburg
points.description: Habsburg palace complex with ornate, baroque interiors, imperial apartments & a silver museum.

points.name: State Hall
points.description: Historic hall in the Hofburg complex.

points.name: Stephansplatz
points.description: A prominent 12th-century cathedral faces a postmodernist building in this central city square.

points.name: Rathausplatz
points.description: 19th-century park with statues, mature trees & fountains, plus summer cinema & winter ice rink.

points.name: Sch√∂nbrunn Palace
points.description: 18th-century summer palace with tours of lavish rococo ceremonial rooms, plus gardens with a maze.

points.name: Vy≈°ehrad
points.description: Fortified castle with a museum, hidden passages, large grounds & remains of a medieval basilica.

points.name: V√°clavsk√© n√°m.
points.description: City plaza with lots of pedestrian traffic, site of monuments, public gatherings & historic events.

points.name: N√°rodn√≠ Muzeum
points.description: Grand museum established in 1818 with a range of natural science & history exhibits, plus events.

points.name: V√Ωtopna Railway Restaurant
points.description: Unique restaurant with model trains delivering food to tables.

points.name: Dancing House
points.description: Curving modern office block by architect Frank Gehry, with top-floor restaurant offering city views.

points.name: Ss. Cyril and Methodius Church
points.description: One of the largest church buildings of the 19th century in Bohemia, built in the neo-Romanesque style.

points.name: National Theatre
points.description: Magnificent venue for nationally sponsored new & classical ballet, opera & theater performances.

points.name: Franz Kafka - Rotating Head
points.description: Metallic, rotating sculpture of Franz Kafka's head, created by artist David ƒåern√Ω.

points.name: Pilsner Urquell: The Original Beer Experience
points.description: Experience the original Pilsner beer and Czech brewing tradition.

points.name: Terasa U Prince
points.description: Upscale restaurant with terrace offering stunning views of Prague's landmarks.

points.name: Gr√©bovka (Havl√≠ƒçkovy sady)
points.description: Peaceful Italian Renaissance‚Äìstyle park with a pond, fountain, statues & a charming artificial cave.
